phases.validation: All elements from product description included in analysis
phases.notes: Phase 1 completed successfully. Comprehensive market analysis shows $2.8B+ opportunity with 2.8M primary targets. Competitive analysis confirms category leadership with contactless technology. Product positioning established around cultural authenticity and privacy protection. Target audience personas defined with clear motivations and pain points.

phases.validation: Strategies align with product description vision and market analysis
phases.notes: Phase 2 completed successfully. All strategy documents delivered: messaging framework with 6 mentor personalities, comprehensive funding strategy with pricing tiers and stretch goals, detailed launch strategy with multi-platform approach. Ready for Phase 3 creative development.

phases.validation: All features from product description visualized and mockups reflect complete strategy alignment
phases.notes: Phase 3 completed successfully. Delivered: Complete Kickstarter mockup with responsive design, Indiegogo variant with tab-based layout and gallery emphasis, JavaScript interactivity, comprehensive styling system. Ready for Phase 4 video content creation.

phases.action: Read and internalize complete product description
success_criteria: All agents understand ZenMirror's contactless millimeter wave radar technology
Key features internalized: breathing/heart rate monitoring, HRV/RSA analysis
outputs: Product description fully read by orchestrator
phases.notes: Phase 0 completed successfully. All key product features catalogued: contactless millimeter wave radar, 6 mentor personalities, mindfulness points system, achievement system, multiple operation modes, privacy-focused design. Style guidelines understood. Subagent framework established.

phases.validation: Scripts capture product description narrative with 75+ shots and 100+ B-roll clips
phases.notes: Phase 4 completed successfully. Delivered: 87-shot comprehensive shot list, 124 B-roll clips across 5 categories, complete hero video script (2:45 duration), detailed 14-day production schedule with $75K budget. Ready for Phase 5 resource compilation.

phases.validation: Final pages reflect complete product description compliance with all features integrated
phases.notes: Phase 5 initiated. resource-compiler assembling final campaign pages by integrating UI mockups, video content, marketing strategies, and visual assets into production-ready deliverables.
